summary.para: Creates an ItemID from the supplied data.

param.name: pinner
param.para: A pointer to the client structure that should be copied.

param.name: pps
param.para: A pointer to an that will be seriallized into the ItemID.

param.name: ppidl
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the ItemID containing the client data and data.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The size of the user supplied data must equal sizeof(T). Do not use structs with variably allocated array/string members. The struct must also follow standard for persistence and portability.

summary.para: Gets a read only pointer to the client provided structure in the first ItemID in the IDList.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL containing the data.
When this method returns, contains the address of a read only pointer to a client provided structure.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns E_INVALIDARG.

summary.para: Gets a read only pointer to the client provided structure in the first ItemID in the IDList.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL containing the data.

param.name: ppData
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a read only pointer to a client provided structure.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns E_INVALIDARG.

summary.para: Gets a property from the within the IDList as a variant, using the key.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL identifying the .

param.name: pszName
param.para: The key for the selected property.

param.name: pv
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property. If rkey is not found, pvar will be VT_EMPTY.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is useful when using , as is returns a variant rather than a PROPVARIANT.

summary.para: Gets a read only pointer to the serialized property storage that is used for storing metadata.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL that contains the location of the property storage.

param.name: pcb
param.para: When this method returns, contains the size, in bytes, of the storage.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns a read only pointer to the serialized property storage.

summary.para: create an instance of the based on the serialized property storage associated with the first ItemID.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL containing the serialized property storage.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the that is obtained by using __uuidof(IPropertyStore).

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a new .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a Boolean value specifying whether the factory is a delegate folder.

returns.para: Returns TRUE if this factory is a delegate folder, otherwise FALSE.

summary.para: Provides the CItemIDFactory an interface used to allocate and free item IDs.

param.name: pmalloc
param.para: A pointer to an interface.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
